name: 123RF
description: 123RF is a royalty-free stock photography platform offering millions of images, vectors, videos, and audio for creative projects.
longDescription: 123RF, founded in 2005 as a branch of Inmagine Group, is a global stock photography platform providing royalty-free images, vectors, videos, and audio clips to individuals and businesses. Its mission is to empower visual storytelling by offering a vast library of high-quality creative assets at affordable prices. The platform serves a wide range of users, including designers, marketers, and content creators, by providing easy access to diverse, professional-grade media. With a focus on innovation, 123RF integrates AI-powered tools to enhance user experience, such as intuitive search and image generation. The platform also supports contributors by allowing them to upload and monetize their content on a non-exclusive basis. It addresses the need for accessible, high-quality visual content for digital marketing, advertising, and creative projects.
features: Royalty-free stock library provides millions of high-quality photos, vectors, videos, and audio clips for commercial and personal use.
AI-powered search delivers precise and relevant results, streamlining the process of finding the perfect media asset.
AI Image Generator creates custom images based on user prompts, enabling unique visual content creation.
AI Background Remix allows users to replace or enhance image backgrounds effortlessly, simplifying complex editing tasks.
AI Image Extender expands image dimensions using AI, offering flexibility for various design needs.
Free images section offers limited daily downloads of high-quality stock photos at no cost.
Contributor program enables photographers and artists to upload and monetize their content with flexible payout options.
Multiple licensing options ensure users can select plans suited to their project needs, from credits to subscriptions.
Mobile-friendly platform allows users to browse, purchase, and download assets on the go.
Global accessibility supports users worldwide with multilingual interfaces and localized content.

faqs.question: What type of content can I find on 123RF?
faqs.answer: 123RF offers millions of royalty-free stock photos, vectors, illustrations, videos, and audio clips suitable for commercial and personal projects.

faqs.question: Does 123RF offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, 123RF provides a free images section with limited daily downloads and a 7-day free trial for premium access.

faqs.question: Can I use 123RF images for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, 123RFâ€™s royalty-free license allows images to be used for commercial projects, though restrictions apply for logos or trademarks.

faqs.question: How does the AI Image Generator work?
faqs.answer: The AI Image Generator creates custom images based on text prompts, allowing users to generate unique visuals tailored to their needs.

faqs.question: Can contributors sell content on other platforms?
faqs.answer: Yes, 123RF allows contributors to upload content on a non-exclusive basis, so they can sell on other platforms too.

faqs.question: What payment methods are available for contributors?
faqs.answer: Contributors can receive payments via PayPal, Skrill, Payoneer, or Alipay, with payouts processed monthly upon reaching a $50 threshold.

faqs.question: How does 123RF ensure the quality of its content?
faqs.answer: 123RF employs professional photographers, designers, and a rigorous review process to maintain high-quality standards for all uploaded content.
